Technical Details:
ğŸ¨ Stylized 2D isometric (top-down) art
ğŸ›£ï¸ 48 seamless modular road tiles
ğŸ”® 151 magic-themed props and terrain objects
ğŸ–¼ï¸ Includes both high-resolution and low-resolution PNGs
ğŸ“ All textures follow power-of-two sizing for GPU performance
ğŸ§© Fully compatible with Unity 2021.3 LTS and above
ğŸš€ Works with URP & Built-in Render Pipeline
ğŸ§¼ No scripts or code dependencies
ğŸ§ª Includes sample demo scene to showcase usage

README:  
TileScape â€“ Stylized 2D Isometric Magic Tileset
ğŸ”® Magic Environment

ğŸ§¾ About This Package
TileScape - Stylized 2D Isometric Magic Tileset is a handcrafted 2D tileset designed for Unity game developers.
It includes everything needed to create mystical environments using modular road tiles, enchanted props,
and optimized graphics for high and low-end platforms.

ğŸ“¦ Package Contents

48 modular road tiles (grid-aligned)

151 magic-themed decorative props (crystals, arcane runes, enchanted terrain, floating rocks, etc.)

PNGs in full resolution and optimized low-resolution versions

Demo scene showcasing asset usage

ğŸ§± Tile Details

Power-of-two texture sizes (e.g., 128x256) for GPU optimization

Grid-ready layout for use in Unity Tilemap or custom systems

Seamless tiling for natural map creation

ğŸ› ï¸ Usage Instructions

Import the package into your Unity project

Use PNG tiles or prefabs to construct maps

Use low-resolution images for mobile builds if needed

ğŸ§© Compatibility

Unity 2021.3 LTS and above

Compatible with URP & Built-in Render Pipeline

Mobile and Desktop ready

No code or scripts included
